mapper.insert: insert into user (user_id, user_name, phone, login_name, password, salt, expire_time, create_date, sex, sts, lock_sts) values (#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expireTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{sts,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{lockSts,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update user set user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, login_name = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, salt = #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, expire_time = #{expireTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR}, sts = #{sts,jdbcType=CHAR}, lock_sts = #{lockSts,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select user_id, user_name, phone, login_name, password, salt, expire_time, create_date, sex, sts, lock_sts from user where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select user_id, user_name, phone, login_name, password, salt, expire_time, create_date, sex, sts, lock_sts from user
